name: medium-banner-remover
description: Simple browser extension to remove annoying banners from medium articles

scripts.zip: mkdir medium-banner-remover && cp -R {src,icons,manifest.json} medium-banner-remover && zip -r medium-banner-remover.zip medium-banner-remover && rimraf medium-banner-remover
scripts.build: npm run test && npm run clean && npm run zip

author: Colin Crawford
